discount_msg: Your Partner for SAP EAM/PM, Automation, and Software Solutions!
home_intro_subtitle: Your Partner for Digital Transformation, Automation & Sustainable Business Development
home_intro_description: THANK KOMPANY GmbH is a Germany-based company dedicated to empowering European businesses through SAP Enterprise Asset Management, automation engineering, software development, and digital transformation.
home_focus_area: We primarily serve clients across Germany and the D-A-CH region, while also taking on international projects worldwide. With a strong network spanning Africa, Europe, and the Americas, we bring global experience and local expertise to every project we undertake.
home_focus_area_2: At THANK KOMPANY, we combine technical excellence, innovative solutions, and cross-border collaboration to help businesses achieve measurable results and sustainable growth.
home_sap_eam_title: SAP EAM/PM Consulting: Delivering digital and smart maintenance solutions with SAP S/4HANA for peak performance
home_sap_eam_expertise_description: As an experienced SAP EAM/PM partner, we assist companies in digitizing and optimizing their maintenance processes.
home_sap_eam_expertise_1: Implementation & optimization of SAP ECC & SAP S/4HANA
home_sap_eam_expertise_2: Consulting & implementation of SAP PM/CS, SAP MRS, and mobile solutions
home_sap_eam_expertise_4: Integration with FI/CO, MM, WM/EWM, PP, CS, RS
home_automation_title: Automation Engineering: Delivering expertise in PLC programming, control systems, and automation solutions.
home_automation_expertise_description: As an experienced automation partner, we help companies develop, integrate, and optimize advanced control systems.
home_automation_expertise_2: Heating systems, tram technology & high-bay warehouse logistics
home_automation_expertise_5: Interfaces: MQTT, OPC-UA, Modbus, Profinet, Profibus
home_software_dev_title: Software Development: Delivering modern, scalable, and secure software solutions for digital transformation.
home_software_dev_expertise_description: As an experienced software development partner, we help companies build, integrate, and optimize modern digital solutions.
home_software_dev_expertise_1: Backend development: Java, Spring Boot, .NET Core, Node.js, Python, Go
home_software_dev_expertise_3: Mobile: Flutter, React Native, Kotlin, Swift
home_software_dev_expertise_4: Cloud & DevOps: AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD
home_software_dev_expertise_5: API & integration solutions: REST, GraphQL, microservices
home_software_dev_expertise_6: Data engineering: SQL/NoSQL, Elasticsearch, data pipelines
home_software_dev_backend: Backend: Java, Spring Boot, .NET Core, Node.js, Python, Go
home_software_dev_mobile: Mobile: Flutter, React Native, Kotlin, Swift
home_software_dev_cloud_devops: Cloud & DevOps: AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD
home_mission_description: Our mission is to deliver high-quality, intelligent digital solutions across smart maintenance, automation engineering, and software development. We are committed to combining technical excellence, innovation, and customer-focused delivery to help organizations streamline operations, enhance performance, and achieve measurable, sustainable results.
home_vision_description: Our vision is to enable organizations to operate with greater intelligence, efficiency, and reliability by uniting smart maintenance, advanced automation, and modern software engineering. We strive to deliver integrated digital solutions that strengthen performance, support sustainable growth, and position our clients for long-term success in an increasingly dynamic and technology-driven world.
home_guarantee_description: We guarantee reliable, high-quality, and future-ready solutions across all our services. Our commitment is to deliver every project with precision, transparency, and measurable value. We ensure our clients receive solutions that perform, scale, and stand the test of time.
home_results_description: We deliver measurable impact, combining technical excellence with consistent, high-quality execution. Our results reflect the trust of our clients, the reliability of our solutions, and the strength of our engineering expertise.
home_contact_form_subtitle: A question? A message for us?
it_service_sap_description: THANK KOMPANY allows you to benefit from extensive consulting expertise in the integration of SAP ERP systems. Our consultants stand out for their experience developed over several years in consulting, implementation, and optimization of maintenance processes with SAP PM (Plant Maintenance) or SAP EAM (Enterprise Asset Management).
it_service_data_management_description: You want your data to be well organized and saved in a secure and centralized storage space to allow you to have access to your data wherever you are.
it_service_web_dev_description: You need an electronic business card, an online store or software on a cloud, whatever the field or sector in which you want your website to be built. With our qualified web developers and designers at THANK KOMPANY, you will find web solutions that exceed your expectations in terms of performance and usability.
it_service_software_dev_description_1: THANK KOMPANY provides you with its expertise in the design and development of your custom software to meet the needs of your company. We listen to your needs, provide advice for improvement if necessary, respecting your business process and applying the standards and conventions of the field exercised by your Company.
it_service_software_dev_description_2: With THANK KOMPANY you also have the possibility of evaluating your software regularly according to the needs and constraints of your Company for complete satisfaction in functionality, ergonomics, performance.
it_service_maintenance_description: THANK KOMPANY goes beyond the installation of new equipment or user training and also ensures the maintenance and repair of computer hardware.
it_service_maintenance_service_1: Intervention according to the urgency of the problem
it_service_maintenance_service_3: More preventive than corrective maintenance (prevent rather than cure)
it_service_maintenance_service_4: Installation and configuration of new equipment (computers, printers, scanners...)
it_service_maintenance_quote: ‚ÄúMaintenance is the key to the proper functioning of your business‚Äù

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have a question or a project in mind? We'd love to hear from you. Fill out the form below or use our contact details to reach us.
